com.nappingcoder.jutil.http
Class HttpUrlBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.nappingcoder.jutil.http.HttpUrlBuilder

public final class HttpUrlBuilder
extends Object

This builder is stingy, it will not include character that is not required. For example, instead of http://www.ea.com/ this builder will produce http://www.ea.com.

Author:
alvinlin
